Module SeleniumOnRails::TestBuilderChecks
In: lib/selenium_on_rails/test_builder.rb

The checks available for SeleniumOnRails::TestBuilder tests.

For each check there exist an assert and a verify version. asserts stop the execution of the test, whereas verifys don’t.

Methods

assert_alert   assert_attribute   assert_confirmation   assert_editable   assert_element_not_present   assert_element_present   assert_location   assert_not_editable   assert_not_visible   assert_prompt   assert_select_options   assert_selected   assert_table   assert_text   assert_text_not_present   assert_text_present   assert_title   assert_value   assert_visible   verify_alert   verify_attribute   verify_confirmation   verify_editable   verify_element_not_present   verify_element_present   verify_location   verify_not_editable   verify_not_visible   verify_prompt   verify_select_options   verify_selected   verify_table   verify_text   verify_text_not_present   verify_text_present   verify_title   verify_value   verify_visible  

Public Instance methods

assert_select_options(select_locator, *option_label_list)

Assert that a select field has the specified option labels.

[Source]

     # File lib/selenium_on_rails/test_builder.rb, line 180
180:   def assert_select_options select_locator, *option_label_list
181:     ls = option_label_list.map {|l| l.gsub(/[\\,]/) {|s| "\\#{s}" } }.join(',')
182:     command 'assertSelectOptions', select_locator, ls
183:   end
